title: 有馬記念の後に・待ちかねた勝利

text_block_list.text: The crowd erupts in cheers for Matikanetannhauser's victory!
Offering the long-awaited victory to the spectators—the 'Arima Kinen' came to a close.
Upon exiting the Nakayama Racecourse entrance, an unfamiliar young Umamusume cheers her on.
'I'm the slowest and least talented in the club, but I won't lose! Because Machitan was trying hard too!' At those words, Matikanetannhauser slowly beams with joy.
'I became that child's protagonist, didn't I?' Muttering that, she watched the small back disappearing into the distance for a long time.
